nodes.text: Khamarese was a spoken language that was used in the galaxy. Around 34 ABY, Khamarese was spoken by the alien Dobbu Scay as he gambled in the Canto Casino on the planet Cantonica.

Khamarese first appeared in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. It was first identified in the Star Wars By the Numbers video "Every Language in Star Wars Movies," which was posted on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel in 2019.
